column4: how do I remove all files with a certain extension but leave one of them? (I have 1000+ pdf's and I want to merge them into one and remove them, but leave the merged file..)
when you merge the one you want move it to a anothe directiry then rm -f *.pdg
amenado jrib Frogzoo__ I guess naming the merged file to out.foo and then removing all the pdf's would do the trick, thank you
